args: What?! You want to go BACK into town?
We got cut short last time, remember?
You didn't get the chance to buy those\nearrings you liked.
I thought it would be nice to go back and\nfix that.
Yes, I suppose we WERE cut short.
No no, I remember. Quite vividly, in fact.
I also recall you said you were eager to\njoin in the Halloween festivities.
And today just happens to be the day.
Ha ha! Okay, you caught me.
I think I mentioned it to you before, but...
Well, I've never had the opportunity to\nexperience a town festival before.
Which is why we decided to hold our own\ncelebration here at the Halidom.
And I'm thankful for that. But there's a bit\nmore to it.
Just once, I'd love to be able to forget my\nstation as a royal and enjoy myself like a\nnormal person.
I'm excited for our party here—really.\nBut...you all still treat me like a prince.
You are lord of this castle. Leave tasks of\nthat nature to those of us who serve you.
But if we sneak into the town celebration...
Allow me to make this wish come true,\nthen. We shall go together.
You needn't thank me, Highness. It is a\nPaladyn's duty to see her lord's wishes...
Ah, apologies. I'd already forgotten that\nwe are dispensing with all that today.
It's my pleasure to help a friend's wish\ncome true...{player_name}.
But do allow me to change first.\nI've had quite enough of walking about\ntown dressed like THIS.
Luca! How long have you been there,\nand what exactly do you mean?
It's a Halloween party, you goofs.\nThe whole town's dressed up!
I hear someone breezed through town in a\ncute costume earlier and it sparked a\nwhole dress-up craze.
In some ways, this is the most\nembarrassing moment yet.
Aw, let 'em have their fun. Plus, this way\nyou get to wear that getup without feeling\nself-conscious!
I suppose if everyone else is in costume as\nwell, there's no harm in joining in.
Wait. Did you come here just to tell me\nthat particular fact?
Yep! Well, that and... Um, sorry for teasing\nyou before.
I can tell how much you like that outfit.\nI shouldn't have poked fun at you for it.
Wha—?! N-no! I'm wearing this purely for\nthe combat benefits, and not...
...No. It's time I admitted it to myself.
I love this outfit. I think it's adorable.
And I'm thrilled at the chance to wear it!
Thank you for telling me, Luca.
Hey, no problem! You two kids have fun.
Not as a knight and her lord—but as a\ncouple of friends.
...Goodness, the town really IS full of\npeople in costume.
Were you worried Luca was playing\nanother of his pranks?
Well, good! Now let's take in the sights!
The festival was a roaring success.\nMany people attended in costume,\nand had a delightful time.

The town was awash in wide smiles.
{player_name} and Elisanne also found
themselves grinning ear-to-ear as
their enjoyable day passed by
in the blink of an eye.
Phew! I think we've done a full lap.
We handed out candy, ate MORE candy,\nbought a nice souvenir...
A day of peace and joy amid trying times.
I'm almost loath to return to the castle.
Once we're back at the Halidom,\nit's back to a knight and her lord again.
Oh! Apologies. It was a silly thought.\nI shouldn't have—
I was thinking the same thing.
We should be getting back.\nI'm sure the others are waiting.
We can't very well begin our Halloween\nparty without the guest of honor.
...No, I suppose not. Let's be going, then.
And thank you. Today will make for a\nlovely memory.
I shall cherish it as well. It was a splendid\nday from start to finish.
(If we'd been born to different stations,\nor met some other way...)
(But that's a dream within a dream.\nA mirage cast by the heat of festival fires.)
(I shall lock these feelings away,\nfor tomorrow it's back to war.)
(Halloween has just given me the best day\nof my life...)
